hibernate-mapping.sql-query: insert into EO_WORK_ITEM (EOWI_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, PM_CODE, EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWI_CODE, EOWI_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWI_QUANTITY, EOWI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI_NET_WEIGHT, EOWI_VOLUME, EOWI_LOT_NO, EOWI_PRICE, EOWI_AMOUNT, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOWI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOWI_REMARK) select SEQ_EO_WORK_ITEM.NEXTVAL, /*EOWI_ID*/ EOWO.CREATOR, /*CREATOR*/ SYSDATE, /*CREATE_TIME*/ EOWO.MODIFIER, /*MODIFIER*/ SYSDATE, /*MODIFY_TIME*/ 0, /*REC_VER*/ 0, /*REC_STATUS*/ EOWI.ORG_ID, /*ORG_ID*/ SYS_GUID(), /*PM_CODE*/ :eowoWorkOrderLinkNo, /*EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO*/ EOWI.EOWI_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWI.EOWI_QUANTITY, EOWI.EOWI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI.EOWI_NET_WEIGHT, EOWI.EOWI_VOLUME, EOWI.EOWI_LOT_NO, EOWI.EOWI_PRICE, EOWI.EOWI_AMOUNT, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOWI.EOWI_REMARK from EO_WORK_ITEM EOWI left join EO_WORK_ORDER EOWO on EOWO.EOWO_WORK_ORDER_NO = EOWI.EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO and EOWO.ORG_ID = EOWI.ORG_ID where EOWI.EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO in (:eowoWorkOrderNos) and EOWI.ORG_ID = :orgId
